languages.text: {n}Несколько часов пролетают незаметно. У вас гудит голова от количества решений, которые пришлось принять за время работы, и неустанного гудения сервочерепов над самым ухом. Впрочем, на вашего помощника жаловаться напрасно: благодаря его помощи вы умудрились проделать заметную брешь в неприступной стене из бюрократии, связанной с управлением пустотным кораблем.{/n}

{n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько часов пролетают незаметно. У вас гудит голова от количества решений, которые пришлось принять за время работы, и неустанного гудения сервочерепов над самым ухом. Впрочем, на вашего помощника жаловаться напрасно: благодаря его помощи вы умудрились проделать заметную брешь в неприступной стене из бюрократии, связанной с управлением пустотным кораблем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}瞬く間に数時間が過ぎた。この短時間に下した決断の多さと、耳元で絶え間なく鳴り響くサーヴォスカルたちの音のせいで、頭がずっしりと重く感じられた。とはいえ、助手たちを叱責する理由は何もない。彼らの助力のおかげで、ヴォイドシップの艦長職を支える生命線、すなわち難攻不落の官僚制度の壁に、かなりの打撃を与えることができたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}瞬く間に数時間が過ぎた。この短時間に下した決断の多さと、耳元で絶え間なく鳴り響くサーヴォスカルたちの音のせいで、頭がずっしりと重く感じられた。とはいえ、助手たちを叱責する理由は何もない。彼らの助力のおかげで、ヴォイドシップの艦長職を支える生命線、すなわち難攻不落の官僚制度の壁に、かなりの打撃を与えることができたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehrere Stunden vergehen wie in einem Augenblick. Dein Kopf fühlt sich schwer an von den vielen Entscheidungen, die du in dieser Zeit getroffen hast – und von dem ständigen Summen der Servoschädel an deinem Ohr. Dennoch kannst du deinen Assistenten nur dankbar sein: Durch ihre Hilfe hast du eine deutliche Bresche in die undurchdringliche Mauer der Bürokratie geschlagen, die eine Art Lebenssaft für Raumschiffcaptains ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere Stunden vergehen wie in einem Augenblick. Dein Kopf fühlt sich schwer an von den vielen Entscheidungen, die du in dieser Zeit getroffen hast – und von dem ständigen Summen der Servoschädel an deinem Ohr. Dennoch kannst du deinen Assistenten nur dankbar sein: Durch ihre Hilfe hast du eine deutliche Bresche in die undurchdringliche Mauer der Bürokratie geschlagen, die eine Art Lebenssaft für Raumschiffcaptains ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les heures passent à toute vitesse. Vous avez pris d'innombrables décisions en un très court laps de temps, et vous sentez poindre une migraine. Il faut admettre que le vrombissement incessant des servocrânes près de vos oreilles n'arrange pas la situation. Cependant, vous ne pouvez pas leur en tenir rigueur : grâce à leur aide, vous avez pu traiter une bonne partie de la montagne de paperasse qui semble être l'apanage de tout capitaine digne de ce nom.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les heures passent à toute vitesse. Vous avez pris d'innombrables décisions en un très court laps de temps, et vous sentez poindre une migraine. Il faut admettre que le vrombissement incessant des servocrânes près de vos oreilles n'arrange pas la situation. Cependant, vous ne pouvez pas leur en tenir rigueur : grâce à leur aide, vous avez pu traiter une bonne partie de la montagne de paperasse qui semble être l'apanage de tout capitaine digne de ce nom.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Transcurren varias horas en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Te pesa la cabeza de tantas decisiones que has tenido que tomar, por no hablar del incesante zumbido de los servocráneos junto a tu oreja. Sin embargo, no tienes nada que reprochar a tus asistentes: gracias a su ayuda has conseguido abrir una brecha considerable en el inexpugnable muro de burocracia que es la savia vital propia de la capitanía de una nave del vacío.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Transcurren varias horas en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Te pesa la cabeza de tantas decisiones que has tenido que tomar, por no hablar del incesante zumbido de los servocráneos junto a tu oreja. Sin embargo, no tienes nada que reprochar a tus asistentes: gracias a su ayuda has conseguido abrir una brecha considerable en el inexpugnable muro de burocracia que es la savia vital propia de la capitanía de una nave del vacío.{/n}

languages.text: {n}转眼间，几个小时就过去了。在这段时间里，你做出了无数决定，伺服头骨阵列也一刻不停地在你耳边嗡嗡作响，你感觉脑子仿佛灌了铅一样。不过，你没有任何理由责备你忠实的助手们。正是由于它们的协助，你才在官僚主义这堵坚不可摧的高墙上留下了相当显眼的凹痕，继续维系着旗舰的命脉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}转眼间，几个小时就过去了。在这段时间里，你做出了无数决定，伺服头骨阵列也一刻不停地在你耳边嗡嗡作响，你感觉脑子仿佛灌了铅一样。不过，你没有任何理由责备你忠实的助手们。正是由于它们的协助，你才在官僚主义这堵坚不可摧的高墙上留下了相当显眼的凹痕，继续维系着旗舰的命脉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zaman su gibi akıp geçiyor. Hayatın boyunca verdiğin kararların ağırlığı ve tepende vızıldayıp duran hizmeletler başını ağrıtıyor. Fakat yardımcılarını azarlamanın lüzumu yok. Yardımları sayesinde uçsuz gemisi kaptanlığını ayakta tutan o sert bürokrasi duvarını epeyce aşındırmayı başarıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours pass in the blink of an eye. Your head feels heavy from the volume of decisions you have made in this span of time — and from the incessant buzzing of servo-skulls by your ear. However, you have nothing to rebuke your assistants for: thanks to their help, you have managed to make a considerable dent in the impregnable wall of bureaucracy that serves as the lifeblood of voidship captaincy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zaman su gibi akıp geçiyor. Hayatın boyunca verdiğin kararların ağırlığı ve tepende vızıldayıp duran hizmeletler başını ağrıtıyor. Fakat yardımcılarını azarlamanın lüzumu yok. Yardımları sayesinde uçsuz gemisi kaptanlığını ayakta tutan o sert bürokrasi duvarını epeyce aşındırmayı başardın.{/n}
